00033 namespace DataBufferRWSTuff {
00034    typedef char One;
00035    typedef struct { char a[2]; } Two;
00036    template<typename C> static One test2( DataBufferRW* a);
00037    template<typename C> static Two test2(...);
00038 }

00040 template<typename T>
00041 class IsDataBufferRWT {
00042 private:
00043 public:
00044    // If the class is derived from DataBufferRW, then the first
00045    // test2 function above withh return one byte.
00046    enum { Yes = sizeof(DataBufferRWSTuff::test2<T>(static_cast<T*>(0) ) )
00047           == 1 };
00048    enum { No = !Yes };
00049 };
